definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: This is a literary and artistic work loved by the masses.
sentences.chinese: 这是一部为群众所喜闻乐见的文艺作品。

sentences.english: Aesthetic value of literary and artistic works should be judged according to their social benefit.
sentences.chinese: 文艺作品的审美价值应当通过其社会效益去检验。

sentences.english: Spirit-resonance is the connotation and aesthetic category of artistic works.
sentences.chinese: 气韵生动是文艺作品的精神内涵和审美范畴。

sentences.english: We must distinguish good and bad literary works.
sentences.chinese: 我们要分清楚文艺作品中香花与毒草。

sentences.english: Literary works should focus on portraying typical people.
sentences.chinese: 文艺作品中应当着力塑造典型化人物。

sentences.english: The solicitude for life has always been the theme of all literary and artistic works.
sentences.chinese: 生命关怀是一切文艺作品关注的主题。

sentences.english: The " looking back" literature and art emphasized the digging of humanity and the innovation of the style of art.
sentences.chinese: 后顾性文艺作品重视对人性的开掘和艺术形式的创新。
